#
Building
Create
rollup
.
config
.
mjs
file
into
the
prop
-
types
folder
with
the
following
content
:
import
nodeResolve
from
"
rollup
/
plugin
-
node
-
resolve
"
;
import
commonjs
from
'
rollup
-
plugin
-
commonjs
'
;
import
injectProcessEnv
from
'
rollup
-
plugin
-
inject
-
process
-
env
'
;
export
default
function
(
commandLineArgs
)
{
const
plugins
=
[
nodeResolve
(
)
commonjs
(
)
injectProcessEnv
(
{
NODE_ENV
:
process
.
env
.
NODE_ENV
}
)
]
;
return
{
input
:
"
index
.
js
"
output
:
{
file
:
"
output
.
mjs
"
format
:
"
esm
"
}
plugins
}
;
}
And
then
run
the
following
bash
yarn
add
rollup
rollup
/
plugin
-
node
-
resolve
rollup
-
plugin
-
commonjs
rollup
-
plugin
-
inject
-
process
-
env

=
production
yarn
rollup

cp
output
.

.
